name: ReactPWA
description: A highly scalable, Progressive Web Application foundation with the best Developer Experience (DX).

scripts.docker:dev:lint: docker run -it -v "$PWD/src":"/app/src" -p 3003:3003 react-pwa npm run lint
scripts.docker:dev:test: docker run -it -v "$PWD/src":"/app/src" -p 3003:3003 react-pwa npm run test
scripts.docker:prod:build: docker run -it -v "$PWD/src":"/app/src" -v "$PWD/dist":"/app/dist" react-pwa npm run build
scripts.docker:prod:image: npm run docker:dev:image && npm run docker:prod:build && NODE_ENV=production pawjs docker build -t react-pwa-prod .
